awd_titl_txt: Particle Accelerator School; Upton, New York; July 24-      August4, l989 (Physics)
awd_abstract_narration: This award will support publication costs and manuscripts                  preparation for the 7th symposium summer school of the U.S.                     Particle Accelerator School to be held at the Brookhaven                        National Laboratory, July 24-Aug 4, 1989.  The symposium school                 consists of two weeks of intensive short lecture courses on a                   broad range of subjects on the Physics and Technology of                        Particle Accelerators.  This year the subjects will include a                   discussion on a variety of accelerators, including pulsed high                  current accelerators, synchrotron radiation sources, high                       brightness beams and free electron lasers, linear colliders and                 SSC.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
